page.title: 20Home Life
page.content: There are four people in my family my mum,step dad,brother and I.I have two pets a dog and a cat.My dad works in Bo Waters and my mum is a housewife. Every Sunday we have Sunday lunch together and watch a video film,we then go to my nans for the rest of the day till about 6.00pm.I help my mum clean-up and make a pot of tea for her so we share in the work.My dad works Monday till Saturday and comes home from work at about 7.00pm,sometimes we go to the Headwaiter and get a video film together.When I come home from school I usually go to the shops if my mum needs anything.On Saturday my mum, brother and I go shopping.....
